Header: Belgium fight back from two down to beat Japan 3-2 in added time
Content: Belgium fought back from two goals down to beat Japan 3-2 with an added-time goal from substitute Nacer Chadli to set up a World Cup quarter-final with Brazil. The first side to recover from a two-goal deficit to win a World Cup knockout match, Belgium was run ragged by a Japan side solid in defence and willing to probe deep.
